text: Five fishermen of Tuticorin survived a boat wreck on Thursday midnight after the mechanised boat, in which they sailed developed a hole at the bottom, sources said here on Friday. The incident occurred around 1 a.m. near Tuticorin new harbour. So the fishermen aboard managed to swim across the waters and reached the shore. All the five fishermen were safe. Central Industrial Security Force personnel are investigating.
title: Five fishermen survive boat wreck
